requirement_tested: Implement a search functionality allowing users to input stock codes or names
user_persona: A financial analyst who needs quick access to stock data.
user_goal: To find information about a specific stock by entering its name or code.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Stock Name
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website and sees the search bar centered on the page. She types 'AAPL' into the search field.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'AAPL' into the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The text 'AAPL' appears in the search box with navy-colored text.

narrative_steps.title: Triggering Search
narrative_steps.description: After typing the stock code, Sarah presses Enter to initiate the search.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system begins processing the search request for 'AAPL'.

requirement_tested: Provide auto-suggestions or dropdown options during stock search
user_persona: An investor exploring different stocks but unsure of exact codes.
user_goal: To quickly locate a stock using partial input and available suggestions.

narrative_steps.title: Typing Partial Query
narrative_steps.description: Mike starts typing 'Tesla' into the search bar to look up Tesla Inc.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dropdown list appears below the search bar showing matching stock suggestions.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Suggestion
narrative_steps.description: Seeing 'TSLA - Tesla Inc.' in the suggestion list, Mike clicks it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the suggestion 'TSLA - Tesla Inc.'
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar is populated with 'TSLA', and the stock information loads immediately.

requirement_tested: Display basic stock information including company name, ticker symbol, and current price
user_persona: A new investor checking fundamental details of a company.
user_goal: To verify the identity and current value of a selected stock.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Stock Details
narrative_steps.description: Emma searches for 'GOOGL' and waits for results to load.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A card displays 'Alphabet Inc.', ticker 'GOOGL', and its current market price.

requirement_tested: Show market trend data with charts or graphs for selected stocks
user_persona: A trader analyzing historical performance before making investment decisions.
user_goal: To understand how a stock has performed over time through visual representation.

narrative_steps.title: Examining Trend Chart
narrative_steps.description: John selects Microsoft (MSFT) and looks at the displayed chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A line chart showing closing prices over time renders within a container with labeled axes.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Chart
narrative_steps.description: Curious about specific values, John hovers over points on the chart.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over data points on the chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tooltips appear displaying exact dates and price values at those points.

requirement_tested: Present financial data such as earnings, revenue, and key financial ratios
user_persona: A finance student researching corporate health indicators.
user_goal: To assess a company's profitability and stability using core metrics.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Financial Metrics
narrative_steps.description: Lisa views Amazon's profile and scrolls down to the financial section.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to Amazon (AMZN) financial data section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Boxes labeled Earnings, Revenue, P/E Ratio, Debt-to-Equity, and ROE show corresponding numeric values.

requirement_tested: Enable users to select different report formats (PDF, HTML, etc.)
user_persona: An office manager preparing documents for internal review.
user_goal: To choose a suitable format for sharing the generated report.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Report Format
narrative_steps.description: Derek wants to generate a report on Netflix and prefers a PDF version.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'PDF' from the 'Report Format' radio buttons.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The 'PDF' option is marked as selected, indicating future exports will use this format.

requirement_tested: Allow users to customize report content by choosing specific sections or data points
user_persona: A portfolio manager focusing only on essential data for client meetings.
user_goal: To tailor the report to include only relevant sections for presentation purposes.

narrative_steps.title: Customizing Sections
narrative_steps.description: Maria checks only 'Basic Info' and 'Insights & Recommendations' for her concise report.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only these two sections are selected for inclusion in the upcoming report.

requirement_tested: Generate automated stock reports based on user selections and inputs
user_persona: An equity researcher needing regular summaries for multiple companies.
user_goal: To compile a customized report quickly without manual effort.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Customized Report
narrative_steps.description: Raj has selected sections and format, now he clicks 'Generate Report'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A loading spinner appears while the system compiles the report based on his choices.

requirement_tested: Include a report summary section highlighting key insights and recommendations
user_persona: A junior analyst presenting findings to senior management.
user_goal: To present an executive summary upfront in every generated report.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Summary Section
narrative_steps.description: Priya generates a full report on Apple and notices a highlighted summary at the top.
narrative_steps.action: Open the generated Apple stock report.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A clearly titled 'Summary' section shows key findings and recommended actions.

requirement_tested: Provide export functionality to download generated reports in chosen formats
user_persona: A compliance officer archiving quarterly reports digitally.
user_goal: To save the finalized report locally in preferred format.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading Generated Report
narrative_steps.description: After generating a report on IBM in PDF format, Ken clicks the download icon.
narrative_steps.action: Click the download icon next to the 'Generate Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The report file downloads directly to Kenâ€™s computer in PDF format.

requirement_tested: Implement a clean user interface with white background and navy component colors
user_persona: A UX designer evaluating consistency across platforms.
user_goal: To ensure all UI elements follow a uniform color scheme for clarity.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Consistent Styling
narrative_steps.description: Jamie navigates through the site reviewing forms, buttons, and informational cards.
narrative_steps.action: Browse various sections of the application.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All backgrounds remain white and all text/components are styled in navy consistently.

requirement_tested: Add loading indicators or progress bars during report generation process
user_persona: A busy professional multitasking between tasks.
user_goal: To know when the system is actively working so they don't re-click buttons.

narrative_steps.title: Monitoring Progress Indicator
narrative_steps.description: While waiting for a long report on Berkshire Hathaway, Olivia sees a spinning loader.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for report generation after clicking 'Generate Report'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A centered loading spinner remains visible until the report completes.

requirement_tested: Include error handling for invalid stock codes or unavailable data
user_persona: A novice investor experimenting with random entries.
user_goal: To be informed politely if something goes wrong instead of seeing broken pages.

narrative_steps.title: Encountering Invalid Input Error
narrative_steps.description: Trying a made-up code like 'XYZ123', Noah submits the search expecting results.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An alert message box appears stating 'Invalid stock code entered.' above the search bar.

requirement_tested: Provide user authentication or session management for saving preferences
user_persona: A frequent visitor wanting personalized default settings.
user_goal: To maintain consistent personal settings across visits without reconfiguring each time.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In To Access Preferences
narrative_steps.description: Wanting to keep his favorite settings, David clicks the 'Login' link in the top-right corner.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal login form pops up prompting username and password entry.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Preferences After Login
narrative_steps.description: Upon logging in successfully, David accesses his saved preferences panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: User profile badge replaces the login link, and preferences panel becomes accessible.

requirement_tested: Enable responsive design for accessibility across different devices and screen sizes
user_persona: A remote worker accessing tools from both laptop and smartphone.
user_goal: To have seamless experience regardless of device used.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Layout Adaptation
narrative_steps.description: Using her phone, Sophia browses the stock report generator during commute.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser window or switch to mobile view.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: UI components resize and rearrange appropriately to fit smaller screens without loss of functionality.
